description: During my sophomore summer, I interned with the Talent Acquisition and Executive Search company Factorial Solutions with global headquarters in Singapore and a knowledge center located in India. I was part of the R&D team of their mobile platform - JobRonto (https://www.jobronto.com/). My work included the following:
tasks: Analyzing and preparing reports that interpret consumer behavior, market opportunities, trends, and investment levels for Indian and Singaporean markets.
Determining key opportunity areas for optimizing application performance & being up to date on mobile technologies' latest industry trends.
Building prototypes at tech scoping stages for the mobile application based on the stakeholder requirements.
Devising business and financial plans for the next two years, clarifying financial goals with reliable cash flow statements.
